channel.title: mobile on Jalolliddin Yusupov
channel.description: Recent content in mobile on Jalolliddin Yusupov

item.title: PoliHUB
item.description:
Course work on Mobile application. Created an application that allows students to consult the lecture timetables

Allow to search by course name and/or teacher’s name

  • Show in a compact way the weekly lectures of the retrieved course/teacher schedule
  • Show detailed data about a given lecture: course name, start time and end time, lecture room
  • Store the results in Google Calendar

Timetable data is arbitrarily provided and stored in the application assets folder as a text (json) file

item.title: PoliToBike
item.description:
The aim of this work was the design and development of a prediction framework to forecast the occupancy levels of bike stations for different prediction horizons. The study objectives are threefold:

  1. To build a prediction model learned from a training dataset for automatically forecasting the occupancy levels of bike sharing stations;
  2. To improve the accuracy of such model by properly tuning the configuration parameters;
  3. To develop a client-server system and Android application to visualize the results of prediction;

item.title: Tabu Search
item.description: An hybrid metaheuristic that combines Tabu Search and Genetic algorithm for solving the VRPTW Vehicle Routing Problem with Time Windows.
